result.title: Strategy for capacity building across stakeholders groups
result.description: The document will report the AfriCultuReS strategy for capacity building towards1Build capacity skills and appetite to work with AfriCultuReS data and findings in local and national government policy2Build capacity and skills in civil society organisations to lobby for farmers interests using AfriCultuReS data3Build capacity and skills in the local European international media to engage AfriCultuReS and similar research groups in the mainstream and social mediaDifferent target groups will require different approaches to capacity building the report will tackle these particularities

result.title: AfriCultuReS Use Cases Description
result.description: This document will describe the Use Cases already introduced in D13 codesigned and agreed with the Users in the eight African countries participating in AfriCultuReS as well as the description definition of additional use cases aimed at meeting the project objectives Special emphasis is given to food security aspects This deliverable will support communication and dissemination activities capacity development demonstration of the AfriCultuReS services and collection of users appraisal
